Bloodstream environment (Blood)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
The Bloodstream environment medium (Blood) is composed of all compounds contained within the bloodstream as described in 
'Predicting Essential Metabolic Genome Content of Niche-Specific Enterobacterial Human Pathogens during Simulation of 
Host Environments'\ :footcite:p:`Ding2016`.

.. list-table:: Blood composition
   :align: center
   :widths: 25 25
   :header-rows: 1

   * - BiGG ID
     - Compound name
   * - akg
     - 2-Oxoglutarate
   * - acac
     - Acetoacetate
   * - adn
     - Adenosine
   * - alltn
     - Allantoin
   * - alltn__R
     - Allantoin
   * - but
     - Butyrate
   * - cit
     - Citrate
   * - fum
     - Fumarate
   * - gam
     - Glucosamine
   * - glc__D
     - Glucose
   * - glc__bD
     - Glucose
   * - glcur
     - Glucuronate
   * - lac__D
     - D-Lactate
   * - lac__L
     - L-Lactate
   * - mal__L
     - L-Malate
   * - mal__D	
     - D-Malate
   * - inost	
     - Myo-Inositol
   * - nac
     - Nicotinate
   * - nicnt
     - Nicotinate 	
   * - pyr
     - Pyruvate
   * - succ
     - Succinate
   * - thm
     - Thiamin
 
.. footbibliography::
